trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> items for the control designer.
Gets or sets the name of a specific table or view in the data source object to bind the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control to.
The name of a table or view in the data source.
A data-binding expression that identifies the source of data for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
A data binding expression.
Provides access to the associated designer component for the data source.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID"></xref> property of the associated control.
The ID of the associated control's data source control.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the data source of this designer.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> associated with the data source of this designer.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.

When the disposing parameter is `true`, the `Dispose` method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner> object references.
`true` to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only the unmanaged resources.
Called by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] after a user selects a data source at design time.
This method is available for derived classes that require additional processing after a user selects a data source at design time.
Returns design-time sample data based on the provided data and using the specified number of rows.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> object containing data to use in creating similar sample data at design time.
The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> object containing sample data for use at design time.
Returns design-time sample data based on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource"></xref> method and using the specified number of rows.
The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> object containing sample data for use at design time.
Retrieves the HTML markup to be used for the design-time representation of the control.
Design-time HTML markup.
Retrieves the HTML markup to represent a Web server control at design time that will have no visual representation at run time.
The HTML markup used to represent a control at design time that would otherwise have no visual representation.
The default is a rectangle that contains the type and ID of the component.
Retrieves the HTML markup that provides information about the specified exception.
The exception that occurred.
The design-time HTML markup for the specified exception.
Gets the selected data member from the selected data source.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> that contains a collection of values used to supply design-time data.
The default value is `null`.
Retrieves the selected data source component from the container of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.DataSource%2A> property.
The selected data source; `null` if a data source is not found or if a data source with the selected name does not exist.
Initializes the designer with the provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
The associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
Called when the associated control changes.
The source of the event.
The event data.
Handles changes made to the data source
Filters the properties to replace the runtime data source property descriptor with the designer's property descriptor.
The properties for the class of the component.
Gets a value indicating whether the associated control has any templates defined.
A value that indicates whether any templates are defined for the associated control.
